import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Fetch from '../Fetch/Fetch'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './UserPanel.css'; const samplePlayer = { id: 1, first_name: "Yanis", last_name: "Thomas", company: "Renard, Breton and Lucas", city_name: "West Mattéo", last_seen: "2018-11-07T02:19:43.768Z", picture: "https://s3.amazonaws.com/uifaces/faces/twitter/operatino/128.jpg", total_events: 102, total_friends: 83 }; const UserPanel = ({ player }) => { return (
{this.state.player.first_name} {this.state.player.last_name}
  • Works at {this.state.player.company}
  • Lives in {this.state.player.city_name}
  • Last seen {this.state.player.last_seen}

{this.state.player.total_events}

events

{this.state.player.total_friends}

friends
) } export default UserPanel;
